<div type="collation" xml:id="Unit_C16">
<seg xml:id="C16_app1-fMS_start"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C16"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0119.01" unit="tei:head"/> <seg xml:id="C16_app1-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app2-fMS_start"/> Chap. 14 <seg xml:id="C16_app2-fMS_end"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0119.01"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C16_app6-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__2"/>The <seg xml:id="C16_app6-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app7-fMS_start"/> next day, contrary to the <seg xml:id="C16_app7-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app8-fMS_start"/> prognostics <seg xml:id="C16_app8-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app9-fMS_start"/> of our <lb n="c56-0119__main__3"/>guides, was <seg xml:id="C16_app9-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app10-fMS_start"/> fine <seg xml:id="C16_app10-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app11-fMS_start"/> although clouded. <seg xml:id="C16_app11-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app12-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24693"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24695"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24695"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24701"/>We <seg xml:id="C16_app12-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app13-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24701"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24693"/>visited the <lb n="c56-0119__main__4"/>source of the <seg xml:id="C16_app13-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app14-fMS_start"/> Aveiron <seg xml:id="C16_app14-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app15-fMS_start"/> and rode about the <lb n="c56-0119__main__5"/>valley <seg xml:id="C16_app15-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app16-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24709"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24711">the whole da</del> <mdel>y</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24716"/>until <seg xml:id="C16_app16-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app17-fMS_start"/> evening <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24716"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24709"/> . <seg xml:id="C16_app17-fMS_end"/> These sublime and <lb n="c56-0119__main__6"/>magnificent scenes afforded me the greatest <lb n="c56-0119__main__7"/>consolation that I was capable of <seg xml:id="C16_app19-fMS_start"/> receiving <seg xml:id="C16_app19-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__8"/>They elevated me from <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24727"/>all <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24727"/>littleness of <seg xml:id="C16_app22-fMS_start"/> feeling <seg xml:id="C16_app22-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__9"/>and although they <seg xml:id="C16_app24-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24732">d</del> did not remove my <seg xml:id="C16_app24-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app25-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__10"/>grief <seg xml:id="C16_app25-fMS_end"/> they <seg xml:id="C16_app27-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24738">t</del> subdued and <seg xml:id="C16_app27-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app28-fMS_start"/> tranquilized <seg xml:id="C16_app28-fMS_end"/> it. <lb n="c56-0119__main__11"/>In some degree, <seg xml:id="C16_app30-fMS_start"/> also <seg xml:id="C16_app30-fMS_end"/> they diverted my mind <lb n="c56-0119__main__12"/>from the thoughts <seg xml:id="C16_app32-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24748"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24750"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24750"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24756"/>over which <seg xml:id="C16_app32-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24756"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24748"/>it had brooded <seg xml:id="C16_app34-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24761">over</del> <lb n="c56-0119__main__13"/>for the last <seg xml:id="C16_app34-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app35-fMS_start"/> month <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24766">s</del> . <seg xml:id="C16_app35-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app36-fMS_start"/> I returned in the <lb n="c56-0119__main__14"/>evening, <seg xml:id="C16_app36-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app37-fMS_start"/> fatigued <seg xml:id="C16_app37-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app38-fMS_start"/> but less <seg xml:id="C16_app38-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app39-fMS_start"/> unhappy <seg xml:id="C16_app39-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app40-fMS_start"/> and <seg xml:id="C16_app40-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app41-fMS_start"/> convered <seg xml:id="C16_app41-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app42-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__15"/>with <seg xml:id="C16_app42-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app43-fMS_start"/> the <seg xml:id="C16_app43-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app44-fMS_start"/> family <seg xml:id="C16_app44-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app45-fMS_start"/> <del type="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24773">t</del> with more cheerfulness than <seg xml:id="C16_app45-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app46-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__16"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24779">I</del> had been <seg xml:id="C16_app46-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app47-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24782"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24784">accustomed</del> <mdel>to</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24789"/>my custom <seg xml:id="C16_app47-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app48-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24789"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24782"/>for some time. <seg xml:id="C16_app48-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app50-fMS_start"/> My <w ana="start"/>fa<lb n="c56-0119__main__17"/>ther<w ana="end"/> was pleased and Elizabeth overjoyed; <seg xml:id="C16_app50-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app52-fMS_start"/> "My <lb n="c56-0119__main__18"/>dear Cousin," said she, "You see what happiness <lb n="c56-0119__main__19"/>you diffuse when you are <seg xml:id="C16_app52-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app53-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24804"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24806">cheerful</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24809"/>happy <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24809"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24804"/> ; <seg xml:id="C16_app53-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app54-fMS_start"/> do <lb n="c56-0119__main__20"/>not relapse <seg xml:id="C16_app54-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app55-fMS_start"/> again!— <seg xml:id="C16_app55-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app56-fMS_start"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__21"/>The following morning <seg xml:id="C16_app56-fMS_end"/> the rain <seg xml:id="C16_app58-fMS_start"/> poured <lb n="c56-0119__main__22"/>down <seg xml:id="C16_app58-fMS_end"/> in <seg xml:id="C16_app60-fMS_start"/> torrents <seg xml:id="C16_app60-fMS_end"/> and thick mists hid <lb n="c56-0119__main__23"/>the summits of <seg xml:id="C16_app62-fMS_start"/> the mountains. I rose <seg xml:id="C16_app62-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app63-fMS_start"/> early <seg xml:id="C16_app63-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app64-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__24"/>but felt unusually melancholy. The rain <lb n="c56-0119__main__25"/>depressed <seg xml:id="C16_app64-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app65-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24828"/> <mdel>my</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24832"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24832"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24838"/>me <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24838"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24828"/> , <seg xml:id="C16_app65-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app66-fMS_start"/> my old feelings <seg xml:id="C16_app66-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app67-fMS_start"/> recurred <seg xml:id="C16_app67-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app68-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__26"/>and I was miserable. I knew how <seg xml:id="C16_app68-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app70-fMS_start"/> my father <lb n="c56-0119__main__27"/>would be <seg xml:id="C16_app70-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app71-fMS_start"/> dissapointed at this sudden <seg xml:id="C16_app71-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app72-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__28"/>change <seg xml:id="C16_app72-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app73-fMS_start"/> and I wished to avoid him <seg xml:id="C16_app73-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app74-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__29"/>untill <seg xml:id="C16_app74-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app75-fMS_start"/> I had <seg xml:id="C16_app75-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app76-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24851">rev</del> recovered myself so far <lb n="c56-0119__main__30"/>as <seg xml:id="C16_app76-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app78-fMS_start"/> to conceal <seg xml:id="C16_app78-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app79-fMS_start"/> the <seg xml:id="C16_app79-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app80-fMS_start"/> feelings that overpowered <seg xml:id="C16_app80-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app81-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__31"/>me — <seg xml:id="C16_app81-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app82-fMS_start"/> I knew that they would remain <lb n="c56-0119__main__32"/>that day at the <seg xml:id="C16_app82-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app83-fMS_start"/> inn <seg xml:id="C16_app83-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app84-fMS_start"/> and as I had <seg xml:id="C16_app84-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app85-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24871">n</del> ever inured myself to <seg xml:id="C16_app85-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app86-fMS_start"/> rain <seg xml:id="C16_app86-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app87-fMS_start"/> and <seg xml:id="C16_app87-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app88-fMS_start"/> cold <seg xml:id="C16_app88-fMS_end"/> I <lb n="c56-0120__main__2"/>resolved <seg xml:id="C16_app90-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24876">t</del> to <seg xml:id="C16_app90-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app91-fMS_start"/> go <seg xml:id="C16_app91-fMS_end"/> to the summit of <seg xml:id="C16_app94-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__3"/>Montanvert <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24882"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24884">by myself</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24887"/>alone <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24887"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24882"/> . <seg xml:id="C16_app94-fMS_end"/> I remembered <lb n="c56-0120__main__4"/>the effect the view of the tremendous <lb n="c56-0120__main__5"/>and <seg xml:id="C16_app98-fMS_start"/> ever moving <seg xml:id="C16_app98-fMS_end"/> glacier had <seg xml:id="C16_app100-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24895"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24897">had</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0120.01"/><lb n="c56-0120__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0120__left_margin__d5e24906"/>produced <sga-add eID="c56-0120__left_margin__d5e24906"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24895"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__6"/>upon my mind when I first saw <seg xml:id="C16_app100-fMS_end"/> it <seg xml:id="C16_app103-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__7"/><mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24916"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24918">how</del> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24921"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24925"/>I <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24925"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24921"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24916"/> t had then filled me with <lb n="c56-0120__main__8"/>a sublime <seg xml:id="C16_app103-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app104-fMS_start"/> extacy <seg xml:id="C16_app104-fMS_end"/> that gave wings <lb n="c56-0120__main__9"/>to the <seg xml:id="C16_app106-fMS_start"/> soul <seg xml:id="C16_app106-fMS_end"/> and allowed <seg xml:id="C16_app108-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24934"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24936"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24936"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24942"/>it <seg xml:id="C16_app108-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24942"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24934"/>to soar from <lb n="c56-0120__main__10"/>the <seg xml:id="C16_app110-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24948"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24950">lower</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24953"/>obscure <seg xml:id="C16_app110-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24953"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24948"/>world to light & joy. The <lb n="c56-0120__main__11"/>sight of the awful & majestic in <lb n="c56-0120__main__12"/>nature had indeed always the effect <lb n="c56-0120__main__13"/>of <seg xml:id="C16_app112-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24964"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24966">tranquillizing the</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24969"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24969"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24975"/>solemnizing <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24975"/> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24978"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="C16_app112-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24978"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24984"/>my <seg xml:id="C16_app114-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24984"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24964"/> mind <seg xml:id="C16_app114-fMS_end"/> & causing <lb n="c56-0120__main__14"/>me to forget the <seg xml:id="C16_app116-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24990">the</del> passing cares <lb n="c56-0120__main__15"/>of life. I determined to go <seg xml:id="C16_app116-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app117-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24996"/> <mdel>f</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25000">by myself</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25003"/>alone <seg xml:id="C16_app117-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25003"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24996"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__16"/>for I was well acquainted with the <seg xml:id="C16_app119-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__17"/>path <seg xml:id="C16_app119-fMS_end"/> and the presence of another <seg xml:id="C16_app121-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__18"/><mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25013"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25015">had the effect of</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25018"/>would <seg xml:id="C16_app121-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25018"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25013"/>destroy <seg xml:id="C16_app123-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25023">ing</del> the <seg xml:id="C16_app123-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C16_app124-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25026">solitary</del> <lb n="c56-0120__main__19"/>solitary grandeur of the scene. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__20"/>The ascent <seg xml:id="C16_app124-fMS_end"/>
